com.hazelcast.quorum.impl

Class QuorumServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.quorum.impl.QuorumServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HeartbeatAware, PingAware, QuorumService, EventPublishingService<QuorumEvent,QuorumListener>, MembershipAwareService

    public class QuorumServiceImpl
extends Object
implements EventPublishingService<QuorumEvent,QuorumListener>, MembershipAwareService, QuorumService, HeartbeatAware, PingAware
    Service containing logic for cluster quorum. IMPORTANT: The term "quorum" simply refers to the count of members in the cluster required for an operation to succeed. It does NOT refer to an implementation of Paxos or Raft protocols as used in many NoSQL and distributed systems. The mechanism it provides in Hazelcast protects the user in case the number of nodes in a cluster drops below the specified one.

      • start

        public void start()

      • addQuorumListener

        public void addQuorumListener(String name,
                              QuorumListener listener)

      • ensureQuorumPresent

        public void ensureQuorumPresent(Operation op)
        Ensures that the quorum for the given operation is present. This requires that there is a quorum configured under the name which is returned by the operation service. This in turn requires that the operation is named and that the operation service is a QuorumAwareService.
        Parameters:
        op - the operation for which the quorum should be present
        Throws:
        QuorumException - if the operation requires a quorum and the quorum is not present

      • ensureQuorumPresent

        public void ensureQuorumPresent(String quorumName,
                                QuorumType requiredQuorumPermissionType)
        Description copied from interface: QuorumService
        Ensures that the quorum with the given name is present. Throws a QuorumException if quorum not present. Does not throw exception if quorumName null or quorum undefined. If (requiredQuorumPermissionType == READ) -> will check for presence of READ or READ_WRITE quorum
        If (requiredQuorumPermissionType == WRITE) -> will check for presence of WRITE or READ_WRITE quorum
        If (requiredQuorumPermissionType == READ_WRITE) -> will check for presence of READ_WRITE quorum
        Specified by:
        ensureQuorumPresent in interface QuorumService
        Parameters:
        quorumName - quorum name to ensure, can be null or empty
        requiredQuorumPermissionType - type of quorum required

      • onHeartbeat

        public void onHeartbeat(Member member,
                        long timestamp)
        Description copied from interface: HeartbeatAware
        Notifies of a received heartbeat. This method is always invoked before QuorumFunction.apply(Collection) so the QuorumFunction can update its internal state before deciding on quorum presence.
        Specified by:
        onHeartbeat in interface HeartbeatAware
        Parameters:
        member - member from which heartbeat was received
        timestamp - timestmap on which heartbeat was received

      • onPingLost

        public void onPingLost(Member member)
        Description copied from interface: PingAware
        Notifies the QuorumFunction of ping loss.
        Specified by:
        onPingLost in interface PingAware
        Parameters:
        member - member which was not pinged successfully

      • onPingRestored

        public void onPingRestored(Member member)
        Description copied from interface: PingAware
        Notifies the QuorumFunction of a successful ping after one or more pings to that member were lost.
        Specified by:
        onPingRestored in interface PingAware
        Parameters:
        member - member which was pinged successfully
